This study attempt determine drug efficacious prophylaxis PCP patient tolerate trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole . Patients evenly divide two treatment arm receive either aerosolized pentamidine every 4 week dapsone orally three time weekly . Follow-up data collect every 3 month , patient clinically evaluate every 6 month . Patients develop PCP severe persistent study drug toxicity may switch alternative study drug clinician 's discretion . Average duration follow-up 2 year .
